name: UFO Hero
description:
A fast-paced sci-fi auto-shooter!

Destroy all the alien lifeforms who threaten your existence in this endless game of survival!

Endless enemies, more enemies are added as XP is gained up to LVL 100 with 10,000 XP

Collect XP and LVL UP

Every level up you gain 2 additional HP

LVL 10: Lazer LVL 1

LVL 15: Lazer LVL 2

LVL 20: Lazer LVL 3

Controls:

Mouse: moves the UFO

M key: mutes/un-mutes the music

N key: mutes/un-mutes the sound fx

P key: pauses/un-pauses the game

ESC key: exit to the start screen

Touch-screen added (let us know how it works for you if you try it!)
